Aeon Labs Gen5 Multi-Sensor¶

Aeotec Multi-Sensor 5 ZW074-C - Z-Wave Plus by Aeon Labs¶

Specification¶

  • Power Supply: USB DC 5V or battery power(4×AAA batteries)
  • Operating Temperature: -10 oC to 60 oC .
  • Measured Temperature Range: -10 C to 50 C . Accuracy: ±1 oC .
  • Humidity Range: 20% to 80%. Accuracy: ±5% (at 25 oC ).
  • Lighting: 0 LUX to 1000 LUX.
  • Motion Sensitivity: 3 meters to 5 meters.
  • Water Proofing: IP42
  • Wireless Range: Up to 600feet/150 metres outdoors.

Inclusion/Exclusion to/from a network¶

  1. Put controller to Inclusion/Exclusion mode
  2. Press program button once. Device will be included/excluded to/from zwave network.

Wake up information¶

  • When battery is used, to wake up device, press and hold its Z-Wave Button for 3 seconds and then release it. Your MultiSensor’s LED should now be solid to indicate that it is active.
  • When completing configurating or communicating with device, to put device into sleep mode for battery saving, press and hold its Z-Wave Button for 3 seconds and then release it.
  • When power-supply is used, device is in waken up state always.

Factory reset¶

Press and hold z-wave button for 20 seconds and then release. LED will stay in solid for 2 seconds and then turn off indicates reset successfully.

Button pressed actions and events¶

Short 1 time pressed
Add device to z-wave network
Remove device from z-wave network
Press and hold 3 seconds Send Wake Up Notification (when it is in battery power)
Press and hold 20 seconds Reset device to factory setting

Link in Amazon¶

https://www.amazon.com/Aeotec-Multi-Sensor-ZW074-C-Z-Wave-Plus/dp/B01HR4NCYW

Configuration description¶

  1. Enable wake-up device 10 minutes after re-power on (battery mode)

    • Parameter: 2 (0x02)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:

      0x00: disable others: enable

    • Default: 0x00

  2. Auto clear motion interval

    • Parameter: 3 (0x03)

    • Size: 2 bytes

    • Value: 1 ~ 15300

      • 1 ~ 255: unit is second

      • 256 ~ 15300: unit is minute with below formular
        1. interval = value/60 (without remainder)
        2. interval = value/60 + 1 (if remainder)

    • Default: 0x00F0

  3. Enable motion sensor

    • Parameter: 4 (0x04)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:
      • 0x00: disable
      • 0x01: enable

    • Default: 1

  4. Trigger commands for motion sensor

    • Parameter: 5 (0x05)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:
      • 0x01: basic set CC (for associated devices)
      • 0x02: sensor binary report CC (for controller)

    • Default: 1

  5. Enable report when measurements reach certain threshold or percentage

    • Parameter: 40 (0x28)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:
      • 0x00: diable
      • 0x01: enable

    • Default: 0

  6. Temperature change threshold

    • Parameter: 41 (0x29)

    • Size: 2 bytes

    • Value:
      1. when unit is Celcius, threshold = set value
      2. when unit is Farenheit, threshold = set value * 1.8
      3. High byte is part of integer, low byte is the fractional part

    • Default: 0x0100

  7. Huminity change

    • Parameter: 42 (0x2A)

    • Size: 2 bytes

    • Value:
      • Unit is percentage
      • High byte is part of integer, low byte is the fractional part

    • Default: 0x0500

  8. Luminance change

    • Parameter: 43 (0x2B)

    • Size: 2 bytes

    • Value:
      • Unit is LUX
      • High byte is part of integer, low byte is the fractional part

    • Default: 0x6400 (100 LUX)

  9. Battery change

    • Parameter: 44 (0x2C)

    • Size: 2 bytes

    • Value:
      • Unit is percentage
      • High byte is part of integer, low byte is the fractional part

    • Default: 0x0500 (100 LUX)

  10. Low temperature report

    When this feature is enabled, sensor will report 0xFFFF to controller in case current temperature is lower than -15oC - Parameter: 46 (0x2E) - Size: 1 byte - Value:

    • 0x00: disable this feature
    • 0x01: enable this feature
    • Default: 0x00
  11. Report items to group 1

    • Parameter: 101 (0x65)

    • Size: 4 bytes

    • Value: 0x05~0x28DE80
      • bit 0: battery
      • bit 5: temperature
      • bit 6: Humidity
      • bit 7: luminance

    • Default: 0x000000E1 (all above items are selected)

  12. Auto report interval to group 1

    • Parameter: 111 (0x6F)

    • Size: 1 byte

    • Value:
      • Unit is second
      • Valid value: 0x05~0x28DE80

    • Default: 0x00000708
